mapper.select: SELECT U.Id id, U.Name name, D.DepartName departmentName, U.LoginName loginName, U.LoginPwd loginPwd, U.State state, U.PROVINCE province, U.CITY city, U.COUNTY county FROM(SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY Id ASC) AS RowNumber FROM [User] WHERE 1=1) AS U LEFT JOIN Department D ON U.DepartmentId = D.DepartID WHERE U.RowNumber > (#{pageSize} *(#{pageIndex}-1)) AND (#{pageSize} * #{pageIndex}) >= U.RowNumber
SELECT COUNT(*) Number FROM [User] U LEFT JOIN Department D ON U.DepartmentId = D.DepartID
SELECT Id AS id, Name AS name, DepartId AS departId, LoginName AS loginName, LoginPwd AS loginPwd, State AS state, DepartName AS departName FROM [User] WHERE Id = #{userId}
INSERT INTO [User](Name, DepartmentId, LoginName, LoginPwd) VALUES (#{user.name}, #{user.departmentId}, #{user.loginName}, #{user.loginPwd})
